mapper.insert: insert into EMPLOYEE (EMP_NO, EMP_ID, EMP_PASSWORD, EMP_NM, EMP_SALARY, EMP_ZIP, EMP_ADRES1, EMP_ADRES2, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_TELNO, EMP_CL, EMP_BIR, EMP_DE, EMP_LEAVE_AT, EMP_LICENSE_AT, EMP_PROFILE, EMP_RESUME, HQ_ID, FRANCHISE_ID) values (#{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empSalary,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{empZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empAdres1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empAdres2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empTelno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empCl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empBir,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{empDe,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{empLeaveAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empLicenseAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empProfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{franchiseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update EMPLOYEE set EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_PASSWORD = #{empPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_NM = #{empNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_SALARY = #{empSalary,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EMP_ZIP = #{empZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_ADRES1 = #{empAdres1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_ADRES2 = #{empAdres2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_EMAIL = #{empEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_TELNO = #{empTelno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_CL = #{empCl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_BIR = #{empBir,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EMP_DE = #{empDe,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EMP_LEAVE_AT = #{empLeaveAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_LICENSE_AT = #{empLicenseAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_PROFILE = #{empProfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_RESUME = #{empResume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HQ_ID = #{hqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRANCHISE_ID = #{franchiseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EMP_NO = #{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select EMP_NO, EMP_ID, EMP_PASSWORD, EMP_NM, EMP_SALARY, EMP_ZIP, EMP_ADRES1, EMP_ADRES2, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_TELNO, EMP_CL, EMP_BIR, EMP_DE, EMP_LEAVE_AT, EMP_LICENSE_AT, EMP_PROFILE, EMP_RESUME, HQ_ID, FRANCHISE_ID from EMPLOYEE where EMP_NO = #{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select EMP_NO, EMP_ID, EMP_PASSWORD, EMP_NM, EMP_SALARY, EMP_ZIP, EMP_ADRES1, EMP_ADRES2, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_TELNO, EMP_CL, EMP_BIR, EMP_DE, EMP_LEAVE_AT, EMP_LICENSE_AT, EMP_PROFILE, EMP_RESUME, HQ_ID, FRANCHISE_ID from EMPLOYEE where EMP_CL = 'COMN06DT004'
